name: Sheraton Phoenix Downtown Hotel

reviews.text: We didn't stay at the hotel, but had the most amazing experience at restaurant in the hotel, The District. From the moment we drove up, the Valet was most helpful and cheerful! Then, we were surprised to see that this was a host hotel for the baseball All Star Game because the lobby was bustling with people and merchandise for sale. This made us think it might compromise our experience because we were going for a family birthday dinner. In no way did the All Star Game activities affect our dinner. We were greeted with a warm welcoming smile from the hostess, had a very friendly, fast and helpful bartender at the bar, then after we were seated, we were blown away at the most incredible service we have had in a long time. Not to mention the food was to die for! For our party of five, we sampled quite a few different menu items and everything was amazing! They even grow fresh veggies and herbs on the roof! And, you can taste the difference with those freshly picked veggies in the garden salad I had. The filet was the best I ever remember having. Our server, Ian, was so patient with us and truly seemed like he loved his job. Being in the hospitality industry myself, I think I'm a bit more critical than most when it comes to service, but The District was such a wonderful experience, I felt I had to share. Keep doing whatever you are doing because it's working. We will be back! :)
reviews.title: Dinner at The District

reviews.text: Beautiful hotel. Rooms are very nice, super comfy beds. Staff was very nice, especially Tracy Simmons in the restaurant. Tour guide/server rolled into one!! Breakfast buffet was amazing!!! I travel to PHX frequently, I will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Wonderful experience!
Service at the "District" Downtown
reviews.text: As aways, great service provided by Mr. Tracy Simmons. I appreciate his assistance and look forward to future visits to the Sheraton.

Excellent location, beautiful rooms, staff is SO accommodating and personal attention is given in a comfortable yet professional manner. From front desk to restaurant staff~ Especially Tracy Simmons in the restaurant...top notch!
reviews.title: As a flight attendant for 25 years, outside of Europe, this location is hands~down the best location in our system.

reviews.text: I stayed here for four nights in June and it was ojne of the best hotel experiences I've had in a long time. From the moment of checkin to the wonderful room and excellent bar/restuarant - everything I hoped for was there.
reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way
Very nice, great and helpful staff
reviews.text: Kristen our Conseirge was just great. She was very helpful, providing lots of information on local sites and well as handling our car rental. She was pleasant and a pleasure to work with.

reviews.title: Very Comfortable
reviews.text: Very Comfortable, from the staff who welcome you like an old friend, to the well appointed, and cozy guest rooms, this is a great place to be at-home-away-from-home.

reviews.title: The BEST HOTEL I have stayed in in a very long time. EXCELLENT OVERALL SERVICE FROM TOP TO BOTTOM
reviews.text: From the moment of making the phone reservation to stepping into the hotel to the stay and into the check-out ...the Sheraton Downtown provide A+++++ service at a very reasonable rate. The hotel is beautifully renovated, large guest rooms, most comfortabel beds and top notch service.

reviews.title: Oasis in the Desert
reviews.text: A simple but wonderful touch was provided when I made a wake up call and the receptionist asked if I would like a follow-up wake up call. The initial wake up call came from the very pleasant voice of Anita and then she provided a follow-up call 15 minutes later to make sure that I was up.

reviews.title: NY elks felt welcome in Phoenix
reviews.text: I also want to recognize Kyle and Jen are the hotel front desk along with Lauren as Conscierge. These staff members went beyond the test of duty to make sure I was provided with the most up to date info requested.

reviews.title: Impressive property, spacious room
reviews.text: I stayed three nights at the Sheraton Phoenix Downtown Hotel to attend a conference. I had a north-facing room on the 11th floor. This is a stunning property: the lobby features truly fabulous artwork and many pleasant seating areas. My room was spacious and had furniture and lighting in abundance, without feeling crowded. (I really liked the armchair by the window.) I also appreciated the spacious feel of the bathroom: there was room enough to use the tub, sink, and toilet without bashing into anything else, which is not often the case in hotels.

reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel! I wish they could all be like this!
reviews.text: The fitness centre and pool were impressive, and I took advantage of both more than once. The fourth floor, where the fitness centre and pool are located, also features a deck area with native plants, where it's very pleasant to sit and enjoy the sun.

reviews.title: What lovely hospitality for lunch!
reviews.text: Convenient location, right downtown and within walking distance of the light rail transit.

reviews.title: Sheraton Phoenix Downtown Rocks
reviews.text: Desk staff were excellent: very pleasant, and more than willing to go the extra mile to iron out an issue with payment on check-out.

reviews.title: great location downtown Phoenix
reviews.text: I'd definitely consider staying here again, should I ever return to Phoenix.

We stayed at the Sheraton in Downtown Phoenix for five nights at the end of June to attend a volleyball tournament at the convention center a few blocks away. This is the third year we've stayed and never been disappointed yet. Our choice has been for a suite at Club Level in order to enjoy breakfast and evening hors d'oeuvres with a glass of wine for a modest price. The rooms are quiet, the beds are great, and the staff responds if there is an issue. We will stay there again for events at the convention center.
reviews.title: Love the Quiet and Attentive Service

reviews.text: After a long week of volleyball it was nice of Chris A. to give us excellent service and provide us with help loading our car for our departure. Even though there were a lot of guests Chris A. never made us feel like he was too busy to help.
reviews.title: Volleyball Festival 2011 Trip

reviews.text: Clean rooms, comfy beds and a spectacular fitness center. Kristi Brown checked me in at front desk and provided me with excellent service. Kristin was very knowledgeable in the local restaurants and downtown scene.
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.text: We were attending a conventionat the Phoenix convention center. Awesome location. Also short walk to the Diamondbacks stadium. Great restaurants within a short walk. Rooms were very clean, updated and convenient. Town car to airport was an added plus! Would highly recommend!
reviews.title: Great location!

reviews.text: This Sheraton sets a new standard for Sheraton hotels. The staff definitely focus on you, the guest. The rooms are all updated and the lobby is very bright and inviting. We had a meeting here and the staff's number one objective was to please the meeting guests - and it showed.
reviews.title: GREAT staff, excellent property for meetings and classy decor

description: The Sheraton Phoenix Downtown Hotel is conveniently located in the center of the city, adjacent to the Phoenix Convention Center and just five miles from the Sky Harbor International Airport.
